entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a student at Hogwarts, mentioned as having friends and being late for Transfiguration class. She is also wearing a necklace that she can't remember who gave her.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is Katie's mother, mentioned as someone Katie spent time with at home before returning to Hogwarts.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dad is Katie's father, mentioned as someone Katie spent time with at home before returning to Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and a friend of Katie's. He is mentioned as being interested in the necklace that Katie can't remember who gave her.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's and Katie's. He is mentioned as being fit again after an injury.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is a person who played in the last match against Ravenclaw, mentioned by Leanne to Katie.

entities.name: leanne
entities.description: Leanne is a friend of Katie's and mentions McLaggen and the last match to her.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a student at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's. She is mentioned as being temporarily driven from Harry's thoughts by his curiosity about Katie's necklace.

entities.name: st mungo's
entities.description: St Mungo's is a hospital where Katie was treated and released on Monday.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, mentioned as being in competition with Gryffindor for the Cup.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, mentioned as being in competition with Ravenclaw for the Cup.

entities.name: cup
entities.description: The Cup is a trophy that Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are competing for.

entities.name: three broomsticks
entities.description: The Three Broomsticks is a pub where Katie remembers walking into the ladies' room before losing her memory of who gave her the necklace.

entities.name: transfiguration
entities.description: Transfiguration is a subject that Katie and her friends are late for.

entities.name: necklace
entities.description: The necklace is an object that Katie can't remember who gave her.

relationships.description: Harry asks Katie about the necklace she's wearing.
Ron is a member of Gryffindor house.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Katie visited the Three Broomsticks pub.
Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are competing for the Cup.
Ron is a member of Gryffindor house.
Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are competing for the Cup.
